Every cancer patient wants to know that their diagnosis, and the corresponding treatment, is determined with the utmost precision, and preferably with the most advanced technology. At Nucleai, we bring cancer patients cutting edge AI-based technology, by improving biopsy interpretation with machine learning and by creating novel precision medicine technology. Come join our team of experienced AI engineers and world-renowned clinicians, and help us make a difference.

 


RESPONSIBILITY

 

  • Lead complex projects involving biology, machine learning, and clinical outcomes. Oversee day-to-day technical developments.
  • Take end to end responsibility for projects success. Manage relationships with clients - from project definition to project delivery.
  • Drive prioritization of the product roadmap and closely accompany the platform development process.
  • Interact with our R&D teams, pharma clients and renowned clinicians to create novel game-changing clinical decision support solutions. 



REQUIREMENTS


  • Experience - At least 5 years of experience in product or scientific project management - must
  • Attitude - “Gets the job done” attitude. Proven record of success leading complex projects - must
  • Communication - excellent English and communication skills, capable of representing the company abroad - must 
  • Experience working in startup companies - must
  • Background - a solid understanding of at least one of the following fields: oncology, immunology, bioinformatics - an advantage.
